description.raw:
To support the gz11 deb generation here is the first set of changes:

* support for `--extra-osrf-repo` in release.py \(to use prerelease \+ stable \+ nightly\)
* support for `--nightly-src-branch` in release.py \(to indicate the branch to build the nightlies from\)

The logic to select the proper params lives at this moment at [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gz11-nightly-scheduler/configure](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gz11-nightly-scheduler/configure) . I still need to migrate it to DSL but the thing seems to be working at the moment:

* sdformat8 

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat8-debbuilder&build=49)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat8-debbuilder/49/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat8-debbuilder/49/))


* ign-common3
* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-common3-debbuilder&build=23)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common3-debbuilder/23/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common3-debbuilder/23/))
description.html:
To support the gz11 deb generation here is the first set of changes:

  • support for --extra-osrf-repo in release.py (to use prerelease + stable + nightly)
  • support for --nightly-src-branch in release.py (to indicate the branch to build the nightlies from)

The logic to select the proper params lives at this moment at https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gz11-nightly-scheduler/configure . I still need to migrate it to DSL but the thing seems to be working at the moment:

  • sdformat8

    https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat8-debbuilder/49/)

  • ign-common3

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-common3-debbuilder/23/)

title: Support gz11 nightly deb generation
